\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* walketh deceitfully, revealeth \w secrets|strong="H5475"\w*: but \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w*, concealeth \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w committed|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H0539"\w* \w by|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1540"\w* friend.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* maketh an unsteady \w work|strong="H6468"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w to|strong="H7563"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H2232"\w* soweth \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, there \w is|strong="H7563"\w* a \w faithful|strong="H0571"\w* \w reward|strong="H6468"\w*.

Some distribute \w their|strong="H2820"\w* own goods, \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w grow|strong="H3254"\w* richer: others \w take|strong="H3254"\w* \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w what|strong="H3476"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w not|strong="H3254"\w* \w their|strong="H2820"\w* own, \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w are|strong="H3426"\w* always \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w*.

He that hideth up corn, \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w be|strong="H3816"\w* cursed among \w the|strong="H4513"\w* \w people|strong="H3816"\w*: but \w a|strong="H7218"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* upon \w the|strong="H4513"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* them that \w sell|strong="H7666"\w*.
